title:
The Lipschitz continuity of the solution to branched rough differential
  equations
abstract:
Based on an isomorphism between Grossman Larson Hopf algebra and Tensor Hopf
algebra, we apply a sub-Riemannian geometry technique to branched rough
differential equations and obtain the explicit Lipschitz continuity of the
solution with respect to the initial value, the vector field and the driving
rough path.
